name: places/ChIJZVTFI6NYwokRF-RA8mOFPGQ
formattedAddress: 1088 Park Ave, New York, NY 10128, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1088 Park Ave, New York, NY 10128, USA

originalText.text:
Prescribed a biologic for severe joint pain due to psoriatic arthritis in February.
This office has a policy that it is the PATIENT RESPONSIBILITY to figure out where the it’s prescriptions go. They refuse to contact patients insurance and make the patient themselves call and navigate where and how they get their much needed prescriptions. It’s FIVE months. 6 phone calls with the office and numerous pleading for them to help. Their answer is , “have you called to figure out where we should send your prescription???
What kind of practice does this?
It’s awful.
Save yourself a headache and go see a different practitioner.

originalText.text:
Doctor Crane is one of the Best Doctors I have known.  He is patient and extremely knowledgeable.  His kindness and patience are the attributes that make him an Amazing doctor!!
I also want to give extremely high praise to his Wonderful staff.  His Wonderful office manager booked my appointment that same day.  I am truly grateful to her, in addition to the woman who answers the phone!! Thanks so much!!  Everyone in Doctor Crane’s office goes above and beyond!!
They are WONDERFUL!

text.text:

I also want to give extremely high praise to his Wonderful staff.  His Wonderful office manager booked my appointment that same day.  I am truly grateful to her, in addition to the woman who answers the phone!! Thanks so much!!  Everyone in Doctor Crane’s office goes above and beyond!!
They are WONDERFUL!

originalText.text: Dr. Crane and his staff are all great. It seems uncommon these days when a medical office goes the extra mile, but that's exactly what they do.  From making the appointment, to the thorough exam, to helping with referrals and following up with results - they are all professionals and I am glad we chose this office!

text.text: Dr. Crane and his staff are all great. It seems uncommon these days when a medical office goes the extra mile, but that's exactly what they do.  From making the appointment, to the thorough exam, to helping with referrals and following up with results - they are all professionals and I am glad we chose this office!

originalText.text: Dr. Crane is an excellent doctor. He explains to the patient clearly about their case and I highly recommend him to everyone. Very gentle and professional.  This bad review is about the staff working over there.  They are rude, impatient and impolite. If you ask a second question for clarification they snap at you. The receptionist complained more than five times during 20 minutes that they are short of 3 staff. Is it the patients problem? Do we have to put up with her temper because of this? I am not going to elaborate about the lady who does the blood test because I don’t want to insult her the same way she insulted me by giving me instructions and address me like a child. The word “please” does not exist in her dictionary. Never ever in my life faced staff as rude as the ones in Dr. Crane’s office! They should all go for a training on how to deal with customers.

originalText.text: This one star is based on the treatment received by his reception staff. This  woman, I believe her name is Lisa, is extremely rude. She must believe that she is irreplaceable based on the attitude she gives to patients and I see from prior reviews that I’m not alone. I thought she was racist because I’ve never done anything to her to be treated with such disdain. However, after reading some reviews,  I believe she’s just a pitiful and bitter woman. I can’t take it anymore. I’m looking for another doctor. Shameful!
